section.p: Beladai’s men are fighting their way into the courtyard, but resistance is stiff, as the garrison reinforces the gate rapidly. A dozen soldiers rush up the stairs of the winch-house to try to close the gates. You hold them off long enough for Beladai’s army to get into the citadel. It is not long before the garrison is overwhelmed completely, and forced to surrender. The citadel is taken. .
